name: Retro Rogue
description:
Introducing Retro Rogue!

Fight your way through endless waves of enemies using one of the 3 available items. Beware, however, that you may only carry one of them at a time and picking ANY other item will destroy the one you're currently holding!

Defeating enemies will increase your BOOST meter, decreasing the weapon cooldown, but pick up another item and the meter will take a SERIOUS hit.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

MOUSE - Look around

SPACEBAR - USE/FIRE item

ESCAPE - Pause game
